forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 46F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine early then becoming cloudy later in the day. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to snow showers overnight. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
